General Description¶

The pyOpTools are a set of packages that allow the simulation of optical systems. Initially it was developed in Python using Numpy and Scipy, but the computational intensive parts are now written in Cython to optimize for speed. It also uses wxpython, matplotlib and pyopengl for the graphic enviroment.

Warning

This software is in a very alfa state, and not ready for production use. Use it at your own risk.
